title: 15p land with house below the market rate
details:
Architecturally designed modern brand new house in Cooray Mawatha, Nawala, Rajagiriya
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Four bed rooms with two bath rooms
Modern fitted pantry
TV lobby
Large front garden in extent of 7.5p ( it can be used for build another house)
Rear space for build servant room and wet kitchen
20ft access road (private road)
Owner migrating, so decided to sell immediately below the market rate
